org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.entity.damage

Class DamageModifier.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.entity.damage.DamageModifier.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResettableBuilder<DamageModifier,DamageModifier.Builder>
    Enclosing interface:
    DamageModifier

    public static final class DamageModifier.Builder
extends Object
implements ResettableBuilder<DamageModifier,DamageModifier.Builder>
    A builder that creates DamageModifiers, for use in both plugin and implementation requirements.
